Journal Papers

  1. Y. Shao, E. Ozfatura, A. G. Perotti, B. M. Popović and D. Gündüz, “AttentionCode: Ultra-Reliable Feedback Codes for Short-Packet Communications,” in IEEE Transactions on Communications, vol. 71, no. 8, pp. 4437-4452, Aug. 2023, doi: 10.1109/TCOMM.2023.3280563.
